body_text:
A manga about a former SWAT guy going to high school undercover to protect a popular idol I'm having trouble remembering the name of a recently released manga. It's about a former SWAT guy, who accidentally walked into the changing room of the idol. She forced him on a ride in her car and left him in the middle of nowhere as punishment. After that, he was fired from his job and kicked out of his home. He got recruited by an old friend to protect some popular idol, who turned out to be the same girl, by going to her high school undercover. He was also ordered to protect her in a VRMMO called Destiny.
It might be a manhwa or manhua? It's also colored.

A recent manga with VR setting about a guy get hired to guard a girl in video game I can't remember the name of it, I started reading it one or two month ago. The guy was some security guard and he eventually got hired as a bodyguard for some girl who was a rising star but decided to go to college instead. Part of his bodyguard duty was to also guard her in some video game. He also created some sword skill which everyone thought was just a rumor or something that couldn't happen.
